user.title: VRChat Friends
user.description: Please enter your VRChat authentication cookie. You can find this using your browser's developer tools while logged into the VRChat website.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the VRChat API. Please check your network connection.
error.invalid_auth: The provided authentication cookie is invalid or has expired.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
